abstract: Temporarily changes the current audio route.
overview:
## Discussion

If your app uses the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/Category-swift.struct/playAndRecord] category, calling this method with the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/PortOverride/speaker] option causes the system to route audio to the built-in speaker and microphone regardless of other settings. This change remains in effect only until the current route changes or you call this method again with the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/PortOverride/none] option.

If you’d prefer to permanently enable this behavior, you should instead set the category’s [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/CategoryOptions-swift.struct/defaultToSpeaker] option. Setting this option routes to the speaker rather than the receiver if no other accessory such as headphones are in use.

# overrideOutputAudioPort(_:)

**Instance Method**

Temporarily changes the current audio route.

## Declaration

```swift
func overrideOutputAudioPort(_ portOverride: AVAudioSession.PortOverride) throws
```

## Parameters

- **portOverride**: The override option for audio output. For a list of constants, see [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/PortOverride].

## Discussion

If your app uses the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/Category-swift.struct/playAndRecord] category, calling this method with the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/PortOverride/speaker] option causes the system to route audio to the built-in speaker and microphone regardless of other settings. This change remains in effect only until the current route changes or you call this method again with the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/PortOverride/none] option.

If you’d prefer to permanently enable this behavior, you should instead set the category’s [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/CategoryOptions-swift.struct/defaultToSpeaker] option. Setting this option routes to the speaker rather than the receiver if no other accessory such as headphones are in use.



## Data Types

- **AVAudioSession.PortOverride**: Constants for use with the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/overrideOutputAudioPort(_:)] method.

## Configuring outputs

- **outputDataSources**: An array of available output data sources for the current audio route.
- **outputDataSource**: The currently selected output data source.
- **setOutputDataSource(_:)**: Sets the output data source for an audio session.
- **AVAudioSessionDataSourceDescription**: An object that defines a data source for an audio input or output, giving information such as the source’s name, location, and orientation.
